website_summaries.verdict: A basic bassinet that offers a lot of features for a lower price than other models we tested.
pros: A lightweight yet durable model that offers parents all they need in a bassinet for a value price
We love its attractive looks and nightlight and sound features
cons: We found that this bassinet's mattress is somewhat thin and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is essentially exactly what we were looking for. It was affordable, simple, and easy to assemble. We like the storage space underneath. In assembling the bassinet, I also loved how snug everything fit when it was together. It makes me feel that baby will be good go go in it with minimal worry from me. The light is nice and calming. I'm not the biggest fan of the music that is played only due to the higher-pitched nature of it, but it is a basic lullaby. Excited to use this product with our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: tweit

customer_reviews.title: Faulty music box
customer_reviews.text: So I just received this Bassinet today and half way through the assembly process it turns out I was sent a faulty music/light box. I contacted the manufacturer and they said that "unfortunately they don't have that part and I'd have to return to the retailer I purchased from" now that's a bummer....... I've built it already that's the last thing a ready to pop pregnant lady would like to do!
customer_reviews.author: jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The baseboard for the bed smells like it was soaked in chemicals for years. It is appalling that this bassinet is being sold at all, to think that babies are being placed in these and breathing in the fumes overnight is so sad. There are numerous reviews of babies hating this bed!! Easy to understand why those poor things!! The smell lingers still, days later after assembling and hoping it just needed to air out. I washed the fabric twice thinking it was the source of the smell. Sadly wasted money. This garbage bassinet is made in china and sold here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to assemble and looks nice enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent middle of the road bassient I would say. It was pretty easy to assemble and looks nice enough. The "sheet" included is very low quality though and not soft so you definitely want to get another sheet for your little one. All in all it works well for us, our little one is 6 weeks and has used it every night since we got home from the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B

customer_reviews.title: This bassinet is horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is horrible!!!!! The assembly is easy, maybe 10 min tops. The problem is that the canopy wont stay on at all! It is easier to put your baby to sleep than to put the friggin canopy on top of this thing, the clamps that are supposed to grab onto the frame of the bassinet unclamp at the slightest touch. Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift! They loved it and it works really well too. The color allowed for the perfect gift before knowing it was a girl or boy since it is gender neutral. For the price it was ideal as it was easy to install and is light enough to carry around the house.
customer_reviews.author: aysha

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a few problems
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet was good for the price. It seems sturdy and was simple to put together. It seems to be a good size for a newborn. Haven’t used for baby yet but have put it together and moved around. The sounds are pretty much useless I would predict. Also, one of the lockable wheels doesn’t completely unlock and clicks as you roll it. Mostly annoying and I am thinking could wake a sleeping baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: It flipped out while my baby is in it
customer_reviews.text: it was a shock when my husband was pulling the bassinet and it literally flipped because of something was on the floor. my baby fill on his head face down! Thankfully he was not injured but this is every mother's nightmare. I regret buying it just because it was cheap, it was useful the first few weeks, but when my baby was 2 months he hated sleeping in it and when just last night he fill from it because it flipped please be careful if you want to use this product, or do not get it at all
customer_reviews.author: laila

customer_reviews.title: Not basic music
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30 minutes to assemble. Will work great for my baby. I wish I could swivel the light. The music was really surprising. It's not your basic nursery rhymes. It's complicated and I won't be annoyed by it when it's playing 6 inches from my head . It is way more than you think you should get for the price. It holds plenty of diapers and wipes underneath . I only wish it came with a second mattress pad cover as I know that one would probably need washed often. It's kinda a strange shape .
customer_reviews.author: Monica VanDeKeere

customer_reviews.title: Best bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We loved this bassinet and so glad I didn’t spend a ton of money on a halo or other brand. I researched for months and this one really covers all needs as babies outgrow most of the bassinets at 15 lbs. Love the wheels so I can tote baby around the house easily. Very easy to put together. Sturdy. Baby slept fairly well. Not quite as well as on the crib mattress but not too bad considering the bassinet pad is thin. Love having baby close by for easier care. Bassinet is so pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Mommaluvs

customer_reviews.title: A neat simple Baby Basinette
customer_reviews.text: Very economical and comes in a small box. We found it very simple to assemble and we took our time doing it while being careful to align each bolt and nut carefully. Only need a Philips screw driver to assemble. It has NO BASKET...but has a small frame that you fit the liner and nice cover over to form the bassinette. It was amazing and it very strong and stable with four small plastic wheels. Mattress and sheet is included. Just add baby! We like ours and it looks fantastic. Good Quality. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SeriousBob

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! Weak! Wobbly!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Nothing lines up during assembly. Fabric is extremely hard to put on. Doesn’t line up either. After spending two hours trying to assemble, we finally made it manageable even though it’s still cheap and wobbly.. we realize the battery part is messed up and doesn’t work. One battery part has two springs, one has none. So the music and light part is completely useless. DO NOT BUY. NOT WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lee

customer_reviews.title: The best registry item!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to ignore the negative reviews and ordered this. I’m so glad I did – your baby will only be able to use it for or five months, so do not splurge on the crazy expensive ones. My daughter loves this and sleeps perfectly in it! I had no problem putting it together and love the night light feature.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Nice but music button stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like this bassinet a lot, great value for price. The only problem is the music stopped working after 1 use. Its not the batteries because the light still works. The music button doesnt work anymore. Too bad. I don't want to disassemble the whole bed to return and get new one that works. Wish amazon would just replace the music machine.
customer_reviews.author: Pathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Gets the job done. The bottom shelf is very handy. We liked it being on rollers, easily rolled from a room to room within the house. Very esimpe to assemble, the material did not have any plastic or other unwanted smell. The light is very bright though, however its easily fixable just throw a burp cloth or something on top and issue solved.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: No safe
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t fun putting together. I never even put the baby in it because I did not realize how unsafe it was until I put it together. There should be mesh sides all around the bassinet for the baby’s safety in case she rolls to her side. I purchased another bassinet once I saw that.
customer_reviews.author: heather cerigioni

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I expected Not as sturdy as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, everything fit, all parts included. The color in the ad shows a pale gray and white and that was fine. This in definitely BROWN and white. Maybe a taupe color but not gray. The picture I took shows the color as it is, don't understand why the ad photo couldn't do that! The mattress will need to be replaced as there is a major flat crease (like it has been folded in half) It's cute but I wish I had spent a little more money and gotten something a little sturdier, it won't be used that long so I guess I got what I paid for!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Custer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and cute
customer_reviews.text: I'm 34 weeks pregnant and I assembled this on my own in about a hour hour and a half. Instructions were so clear. I haven't used it yet so I can't talk about how durable it is but so far it looks cute price was okay. Only complaint is there's two models (one that vibrates and one that doesn't) and I guess it's up to manufacture to send you either one because I didn't have a choice. I wouldve preferred the one with vibration. Other then that, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Yolandie

customer_reviews.title: Very basic lightweight, infants under 15 lbs
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is very lightweight, basic design. Not really structurally strong, I do not see this holding up long. light enough to lift and move. My two month old baby loves it, the hood amuses her, and she likes the movement when she wiggles. I got this to have next to the dinner table, since she won’t let us eat unless we have her with us . It’s the perfect height beside table.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the white and the style(in the picture)I am upset because we spent time assembling and kept wondering what was wrong only to realize that two screws were missing the metal thing for it to screw into. All the others had except that part and it made the bassinet very unstable and unsafe. I am currently waiting on a replacement bassinet as waiting for parts would take too long. (The company wasn’t answering their phone) I am hoping that this would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Dene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations, we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for this price. Our baby wasn't able to sleep with the cushion provided, it seemed too hard so we added our own. Otherwise we love it. Even with carpet it's easy to roll around the house so we don't have to wake the baby when we need to roam about the house. The storage underneath is perfect to store a burp cloths and extra onsies. The night light and music built in is super convenient to have built in. Has my recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broken.
customer_reviews.text: One of the weeks are broken! It popped off and won't go back together. Everything else was great. Need to get a new wheel for a new bassinet. The other 3 wheels have no problems. Only took 15 minutes to put together by myself with being 38 weeks haha. If you could send me a new wheel I would give 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Handy bassinet, great for grandma's house
customer_reviews.text: I'm both grandma and daycare, and I wish I had bought this for my first grandchild! Super handy, rolls all over the house or outdoors, yet has locking wheels so toddlers can't "drive" it about. Light weight and easy to maneuver but sturdy enough for a tank of a baby. I kept my grandson in this until 5 months old. Highly recommend. I'm selling mine used now for a little over half the price so the cost of using this was essentially $20 .
customer_reviews.author: Sheri D.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how small the box was. But when assembled the bassinet was good sized. I liked that the wheels had easy lock/unlock on them. The cushion was about 1/2 inch, soft but not squishy. The baby would sleep on a 100 level flat surface. The bonnet was a nice touch. I never put the music thingy on there, left it in the box. My guests took it with them when they left, so I guess it was a hit. Overall a good value for the money, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap! Not worth the money. Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Holes dont line up. Not worth $10, let alone $50. This is chinese knock off crap. Not stable at all. Most of the 1 star reviews are actual customers. The rest seem fake and are not realistic reviews. Scam. Amazon needs to refund and ban this.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a temporary bassinet because I was moving as soon as my daughter was born. So I gave this bassinet a try since I wouldn't have time to set up an actual crib. So it's a good size for a newborn up to about 6 months. The only really negative thing I can say about it is that is doesn't disassemble easily for travel. My husband and I had a fun time putting it together. It was hard but just because we are silly. It's not actually difficult. It's kinda old lady ish. But when you're on a budget, looks don't matter as much.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: A bassinet on wheels is amazing. It was so convenient being able to roll this from room to room when needed and the back wheel locks. It was easy to put together but did not feel the sturdiest however, I had no issue with it. The vinyl pad cushion is a good thickness too. The BEST part of this bassinet is the pad covering. The newborn pee and spit up came right out of it and it dried quickly. I had to wash it more times than I can remember and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Height
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet was great! It was the perfect height for right next to my bed. The mattress cover was an awesome material that made it super easy to wipe off spit off. It must have been very comfy because my son slept in it great. The night light and sounds turn off automatically after a short time which is very annoying, but other than that they both work great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Our Little One Sleeps well
customer_reviews.text: Good things: - easy assemble - baby sleeps well in it - very portable Drawbacks: - wheels aren't great but they do their job - the support tubes on the sides need more padding. We stuck some material around it and all is good now. Overall, we would buy this again for our baby. We even gifted one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son in law put this together very quickly and easily. My grandson has not been born yet so I can comment on the vibration or how well he sleeps in it yet. I’ll update around November
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dufour

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when baby is sleeping in there !
customer_reviews.text: It’s very light , you need to be careful . I have two baby. One is 23 months ,one is one month . My bigger one always like to push the it when her sister sleeps in there . One time she push over it , scared me ! So Just be careful !
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 36 weeks and it Took me about 45 mins to build myself! Might’ve took me less if it weren’t for my bump but it was very easy to assemble! It’s very cute and sturdy. The light is bright enough, I don’t think it’d wake up the baby and the music is cute, basic but cute. I love it! Can’t wait for my little one to sleep in it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Deb F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product- Especially for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people said the bassinet wasn’t sturdy, and even my husband initially questioned it when he began putting it together. However, once he was finished, the bassinet proved to be sturdy. Love the light feature, but not a fan of the music. The music is not exactly soothing sounding, but I didn’t really care since I wasn’t looking for a bassinet with a music feature. It was very easy to assemble. Love that the bassinet has mesh sides and storage underneath. Overall, great purchase for the price! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Pokorny

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would write a review since there are many mixed reviews. This bassinet was lovely I am 7 months pregnant and assembled it myself in about 20 minutes. It is NOT wobbly as some reviews state, maybe they didn't read the assembly instructions properly. But anyways, I love this bassinet it's perfect in height , looks cute, and very sturdy and would most definitely buy it again if need be!cant beat it either for the price. I can't wait to see how good my new baby will sleep in this!
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my second baby! I wish I'd had this for my first born. I keep her right next to my bed at night and the little light is perfect for night time diaper changes. I love that I can basically roll her around the house whenever I am without disturbing her. The storage underneath is awesome! The music setting is a little tacky and only plays for about 3 minutes but that's not why I bought it. I will agree with the other reviews that it is not extremely great quality. A bit flimsy and sometimes the wheels catch a little. However it does the trick and I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Longbeard

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This has made watching my little one so much easier. Now I can roll her bassinet up to the kitchen whenever I cook dinner instead of leaving her in her crib and she can sleep next to me in my room now. No more running to the nursery in the middle of the night. The bassinet itself is durable; it will only be shaky if you dont screws in the screws tightly. Assembly is an easy one man job as long as you follow the instructions. Now if only I could fold it up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rashida

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It asked me to rate the vibration quality, we don't have that ability on the one we got. Not sure if we were supposed to, but I like it. My daughter sleeps with me, but when she falls asleep in my arms, I can transfer her to the bassinet and she sleeps just fine. It was super easy to assemble, it only took my husband 15 minutes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Price
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet worked perfectly for me. My baby did not like sleeping anywhere but on me the first month so we had a co sleeper and would only use her bassinet for naps, however at around a month i was able to get her to sleep in her bassinet. I love having her near me as she sleeps. I love how easily it is to move this bassinet and it was relatively easy to put together. I had no problem with it being wobbly at all. This bassinet worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nessarocks100

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money with this one. I put it together and thought I did it wrong because it was not straight and looked crooked. So my husband took it apart and tried and it was still crooked. This is garbage and would not want to put my baby in it. Doesn’t seem safe. We packed it up and returned it same day!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy4kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bassinet! I haven’t had my baby yet but it was easy to put together, looks just like the picture and sits high enough to reach my bed! The only one minor thing is the mattress is kinda crappy- I’m going to try and find a thicker one, not sure if they sell them separate or not. Otherwise I like it and it seems great so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie Headland

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price, as long as you don't care about having a covering
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet is perfect for what I need. Love that it's on wheels. My baby sleeps beside me and when she fusses at night I will wheel her into the bathroom for feedings. Very easy to assemble. My only complaint is that the awning/covering constantly pops off (see picture). I like the covering because I sleep with a fan on and this helps to keep it out of her face. But it constantly pops off and I'm always fitting to put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: brendan karanasios

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional. Love that it has wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bassinet because it has wheels. It's easy to move from room to room. The only negative thing I have to say is the speaker has a rhythmic "eeehhh" noise that consistently happens when the music is played. It almost sounds like the speaker has blown but it's just a single weird tone that follows the tempo of the song. It's very clearly not part of the song.
customer_reviews.author: Merrily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cute bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and with instructions although my boyfriend is a handy man and put it together without needing them. It's super cute and I love the added box that plays different lullabies and is used as a night light. The pattern is adorable and my babygirl will make great use of this bassinet once she arrives. Awesome price, great quality and overall beautiful look. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Gast

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great deal. Not the prettiest bassinets, but they did the job. I don’t like the color of the material.Easy to move around because of the wheels and it is Light weight. Used them until my babies were 4.5 months because we were about to move so they are big enough for that. They aren’t super solid, but they aren’t going to fall apart or fall over. It’s actually a good thing because you can jiggle the bassinet a little to calm your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bassinet except for the basket underneath. It's too light to hold anything other than a travel container of wipes and a few diapers. I would have liked to store blankets and burp cloths under the bassinet. I was scepticle when the bassinet arrived in a smaller than expected box. However, it's holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Neff Fam

customer_reviews.title: Simple,  convenient  and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were pretty hesitant about buying such an inexpensive bassinet. But honestly it’s been one of our best purchases! We wheel it all around the house during the day. It’s been great having the baby napping right next to us in the living room or dinning room. We of course have a beautiful crib in her room but this bassist really has been handy and looks great! Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Joski

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this basinet is wonderful. I wanted something small for our bedroom and it's worked out perfectly. The underneath storage is great and the light/sound came in handy to check on her in the middle of the night. Only cons are is the matress is very hard so she doesn't sleep as well in it as her crib and the sounds don't have a true white noise (it's mostly lullabies).
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bassinet. Bought it for my grand daughter when she is here at our home. I added the pink ribbon to give it some color. Not sure about the mattress pad. It seems a little two thin and is just a piece of foam. Looked on line for one that was made better but they all seem the same. I added a mattress pad under the sheet. Hope that helps some.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly & Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter before she was born. I was 9 months pregnant and found it very easy to assemble. Some people say it feels unstable but it’s really not. I love that it has some movement to the frame because I can reach over and gently rock her back to sleep with one hand. I think the only improvement that could be made is to add a vibration feature. It would save me from rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Humphrey and Carrie Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bassinet and my baby seems to sleep well in it. The main thing I like about it is it rolls well. This is a big deal for me as I work from home and I basically roll it all over the house with me. It rolls well on tile, and carpets. The main thing I dont like is the quality of the mattress pad. It is very thin. I purchased a second pad for it and also a wedge to help incline him since he has acid reflux and this has helped. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it to friends
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brumbalow

customer_reviews.title: I recommend great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and directions were easy and simple. My baby sleeps very well inside I recommend putting own sheet down like maybe a thin sheet or two for baby’s comfort and just to be safer in my opinion. I love the nightlight but not so much the music only some of the songs one or two my baby just doesn’t like lol. Great support and very sturdy I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Cute color. It has a light!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet was actually more perfect than I expected! It comes in a single box with directions for easy construction (all you need is a screwdriver). It looks exactly as pictured, with an unexpected bonus (I guess I didn't read the product description very well) of a music player and light that hooks on the the front of the bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: N.L. White

customer_reviews.title: Newborn Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bassinet! I didn’t think I would love it this much but it’s so cute and the perfect size for a newborn and months+. It was very easy to put together and I love the night light it comes with! The only thing that sucked was it didn’t come with batteries. I always hate getting a product and it doesn’t include batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Leana

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Bed
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for my two babies. It’s still in good condition! Just gave it to my best friend for her baby, so it’s definitely good enough quality to last for awhile. My husband would want me to mention that the instructions weren’t helpful and it was hard to set up (not sure if they have changed that at all— we purchased in 2017), but overall a great product
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and super functional!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useful item I’ve gotten for my newborn. She is 6 days today and I love this bassinet. It’s adorable but functional! She sleeps comfortably. If she makes a noise in the middle of the night, there’s a light I can turn on to check on her. I can wheel it around the house to the bathroom or kitchen and keep her happy and comfortable. It’s also nice because I can put blankets etc underneath for extra storage. If I wheel her to the kitchen and have my phone, water bottle, snack etc I can store those things in it and easily wheel her back into my room.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rosier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together - Sturdy and easy to move from room to room
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet was easy to put together and its very light so easy to move around. The hood however kept popping off the rail which was a little annoying. My daughter outgrew this pretty quickly so the low price was a great factor as i didn't feel it was a huge waste.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for third baby, simple and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our third baby knowing we wanted something simple and affordable. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. Love that it is on wheels so it can be easily moved even if baby is sleeping in it. My son sleeps well in it. We haven’t used the vibration or music settings at all only because he sleeps well without it. Great price and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: This product may not be the most aesthetically pleasing, but this has been a life saver for my family! We have a pretty high bed and this bassinet is high enough for me to reach over and grab our little one in the middle of the night! The canopy is wonderful and the little storage underneath is quite handy! The mattress is a bit hard, so we bought s mattress pad and cover and haven’t had any issues!! A great product for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful place to sleep
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful place for my new grandson to sleep, in the Delta Children Sweet Beginnings Bassinet, Falling Leaves. It was just the right thing for his traveling parents to have. My grandson fit in it perfectly even though he was over 8 lbs. His parents will be going overseas but will give the bassinet to other parents of newborns, so they will be able to share in the comfort and joy for their new baby.
customer_reviews.author: yerevan

customer_reviews.title: Great value, safe sleep
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and safe bassinet with a good sized fabric shelf underneath. Assembly took about 15 minutes and was the same process as most bassinets. I wish the wheels rolled more smoothly on thick carpets, but it's not expected at this price range. Also, the attachment has a light and plays music, but does not vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Its nice that it has a light
customer_reviews.text: Feels a bit flimsy but does the job. I would not repurchase. I gave it as a gift and then it was given back to me for my baby. It really is just for those first couple months. Its nice that it has a light. Not sure about all the music but the light is nice. Has a nice bed height I was able to look down from my pillow at baby and easily reachable.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I will break within a month!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is very cheap! The canopy falls off while baby is sleeping and wakes him. The canopy already snapped in half because it has a hole right in the center at the top and makes it weak and I haven't had it but month and a half!!!! This is the worst bassinet I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: T. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Why spend more than this?!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I didn’t get conned into buying a more expensive bassinet! My first baby will be here in a few short months and we wanted to get some basics set up. It was really easy to put together! It seems unstable at first, but once you secure the support bars it’s solid! I’ve already moved it from one room to another (pre/post set-up) and it moved nicely. The mattress is thin and seems uncomfortable, but apparently it’s ideal not to be too cushy to prevent SIDS. I can’t wait for my little human to sleep in it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Replogle

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: My newborn is almost one month and she’s been using this bassinet everyday. I do recommend this bassinet for parents who are on a budget, and need a product that can do the job. It’s a simple, cute, and it has wheels, so I can easily move the bassinet around anywhere around the house. I almost purchased the halo bassinet, but that bassinet does not have wheels to move around. One con: the mattress that came with the bassinet is horrible. I purchased a separate mattress for this bassinet; one of better quality and more firm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and well designed bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I like it. My son doesn't. In hindsight I think something with transparent sides would have been better for us. But it's lovely. We use it as a changing table now. I like the extra storage. under it and the hood. The light is wonderful for night changes.
customer_reviews.author: Webdiva

customer_reviews.title: Love love love! Must buy for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe the quality for this price! Best buy! Perfect bassinet, so happy with it. The only way it would be better if it had some rocking movement built in, but can’t complain for this price. It has wheels so I can just wheel the baby in different rooms where I have to do my chores without leaving her alone.
customer_reviews.author: Nat B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering this product I had it five years ago with my son . I like the product it’s nice to have on the side of your bed when you bring your baby home and don’t exactly have the balls to put them in their own room away from you I know I didn’t ! I’ll keep my daughter in it until she can’t be in it any longer . Maybe 5 months ? Give or take .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My friend LOVES this for her baby
customer_reviews.text: My friends new baby loves this bassinet. She sleeps here until she's bigger for a crib. My friend loves it more. She said being able to roll the bassinet from room to room when she needs to is wonderful. It is sturdy and sweet looking. I'm really happy this gift is so loved.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and does the job
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bassinet in a rush when our baby was born a month early. It was easy to assemble and does the job. It feels a little lightweight and shaky but it’s not going anywhere. The music it plays is a little chimey but I do like the light feature. I would recommend it if you are looking for an affordable bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and ecnomic bassinet
customer_reviews.text: The baby can only sleep in the bassinet for the first 3 month, but it definately worth to buy. It is a good alternative place for baby to sleep in the living room if you dont want your baby to always sleep in the crib in the bedroom. I also transfer the baby from room to room in it, and we even change diapers on the bassinet. I think I really made a good decision to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and dirty .. used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself off of my baby registry and just got to putting it together & I recurved it damaged and with little yellow stains all over it. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's too bad that this product only supports the baby until 15 lbs. I really like this product. It doesnt have the vibrator like the older versions, but it has music and night light. I ordered an additional waterproof mattress pad and Jersey mattress sheet covers. The mattress is thin and soft, but I figure the firmer the better to avoid SIDS.
customer_reviews.author: Mama2019

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is awful. This is my third baby and I’m so disappointed in this product. The canopy is meant to clip on and DOES NOT stay on. It wakes my sleeping baby up when it loudly pops off. My husband is the most mechanically inclined person I know and he says it’s a design flaw. Buy another bassinet. This one is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a slip cover for the thin mattress that is included. I just laid a thin towel over it and tucked underneath it. You could probably use just the cover and wash that as needed. The bassinet sheets I bought separately bunched the mattress up. Good bassinet for the price. I’m convinced very few babies spend more than a few weeks in a bassinet, no matter which is bought!
customer_reviews.author: readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Last minute buy and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bassinet. I ordered this last minute when I realized a different one my mil had ordered was incomplete. I ordered it two days before my baby was born and I’m happy I did it is perfect nice and sturdy. It’s been 2 almost 3 months since I got it and it’s still perfect and it was very inexpensive as well
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: works great. wasn't sure how sturdy it would be when ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. wasn't sure how sturdy it would be when I was putting it together but it works great for the baby. Sturdy but not heavy. Easy to move which is great because I move the bassinet from my bedroom to the living room each day and it is easy to pick up and cary to another room. My only complaint is that the thin sheet cover stains very easily and i can't get the spit up stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but works great in our living room for our newborn
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy, but works great in our living room for our newborn. I cut off the "skirt" so I can see him through the mesh, and it looks way more sleek that way too.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy Y. P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. You don’t need a bassinet for long and this such a practical purchase. Had one for each baby and was so glad I didn’t spend 2-5 hundred dollars on other ones that would have been equal in use.
customer_reviews.author: Talisman K Lundy-Lleshi

customer_reviews.title: Simple Basic ok item
customer_reviews.text: Its super simple. On the other hand its sturdy and wont break easily. If you want to save money this is the perfect buy for you. I on the other hand did not like it, plus they send the wrong lamp that comes with it. Since i only paid 25 for it, i didn't mind, but would get something better. Oh and buy a sheet since the pad is super thin its like putting the baby in a cardboard box..
customer_reviews.author: FiveInACup

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn slept best in this bassinet when he couldn’t in his full size crib or bedside sleeper. So comfy and easy to move around. Now we use it as a day-time bed occasionally. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these bassinets, one for my house and one for my MIL's house who watches my baby. They are FANTASTIC. I roll her around wherever I go during the day and she sleeps in it at night. It is affordable, well made, pretty and just all around a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. It was perfect. Nothing to fancy. Great quality. My little one is just now growing out of it at 6 months. The night light on the front of it is perfect. I could have done without the music but it was easy to just not use it :) No problems at all with it. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Likes: price Dislikes: relative difficulty assembling base board due to poor tolerances; seems flimsy, not like I’m worried about child safety flimsy, but more of a “yeah, I did buy an inexpensive product”
customer_reviews.author: Carpe diem

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Yes, this is not the most solid , most beautiful bassinet out there, but for the price, ease of assembly, and overall usage we've gotten - it has been great. I wish I would have bought this for my first daughter. My 2 month old sleeps in it every night next to our bed. Since its wheeled it's easy to slide for late night feedings and changings.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and it looks nice. I love the storage area underneath. It's big enough to have a good bit of items in the storage area. The night light is not too bright so it won't disturb the baby when you check on them. The music is nice but my baby prefers "womb sounds".
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I used this mod with my other son. So when I got pregnant again it was a no brainer on which bassinet I wanted again. Truly love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Hood won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: This is decent quality with one exception. The hood will not stay on. We have tried everything and finally gave up and left it off. If you are buying this intending to use the hooded piece, find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: curlylocks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I got this bassinet for my sister and it came in damaged I had to go out and buy a new one mind you we live in 2 different states and now we are stuck with this damage bassinet and they did not want to give me back my money unless I ship it back but she is in the hospital having her baby and no way I can send it back due to me being in another state do not buy this at all
customer_reviews.author: Ivelise

customer_reviews.title: Good for new born but cant use after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bassinet for a new born. I bought it for my living room which is downstairs, but my little one doesnt like it much. It is a nice bassinet and easy to clean also and lightweight. It would have been better if it had vibration as well.
customer_reviews.author: ringhals

customer_reviews.title: It was a bit ugly, returned it.  For someone on a budget, its a good bargain for a Bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: It reminded me of Rosemary's baby, so I had to return it. Not for us, but for sure if you need a budget bassinet, this is one of the lowest cost ones you can find.
customer_reviews.author: Debounce

customer_reviews.title: Good bassinet
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with the purchase. After reading reviews I had mixed feelings, didn't want to waste my money. I feel it's exactly what I was looking for and I'm happy with the price paid. My husband and 2 year old put it together quickly. It seems sturdy enough for a small baby and will hopefully do what's need for the first few months. Baby isn't here yet so I can't comment on sleep quality or their liking. Overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Couturier

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt look the same as pictured. Sturdy and easy to assemble though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the falling leaves pattern, it looks very neutral in the photo but after assembling and the whole thing it has a pink hue to it. I wouldn't have bought that pattern for my boy if I knew that 🤷‍♀️ but it is great quality, very sturdy and was easy to assemble. Overall really good, just disappointed the coloring is different than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Unstable!
customer_reviews.text: This product was just very wobbly and unstable. If you live in an earthquake zone, it would be very unsafe for your baby, or if you have any other kids that would rest their weight on it, it would be bad news. Luckily I returned my for refund because I did not feel comfortable putting my baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jericca

customer_reviews.title: Decent!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our newborn. Product seemed to be good quality, had all pieces, etc. Decent for the price. Although the matress piece was a tad big for the fabric and fits a little tightly and "lumpy". Also easy instructions but a bit difficult to assemble. But otherwise good buy!
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I was 9 months pregnant and I was watching a movie while assembling this. Finished it in about 15 mins. Looks really cute. Gave 4 stars because there’s not a print or color to choose from. The color is pretty blah. But I don’t mind. For the price I paid, and for the time my baby will be in it, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Reasonbly priced quality bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We've used this bassinet for 7 weeks. Pros: Much less expensive than competing models Wheels make it easy to move around without waking baby. Built in night light is handy for late night diaper changes All to fabric can be removed and washed except for the canopy Cons Skirt is opaque so you can't see baby inside Replacement sheets are hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bassinet. It has a cute design, and a nice storage space underneath. The instructions were easy to follow, so that was a plus. My only problems are the wheels, and the cover. The wheels lock randomly on their own which is a pain when you have to move it, but it's easy to push even when they're locked. The cover, the part that is over the bassinet that helps shield from light, is really loud when you move it up and down. I rarely use it, so it isn't a problem for me. I highly recommend this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first sleeper bed for an infant
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is a great first bed for a newborn. The unit is easy to assemble and just the right height for new moms who will find it difficult to lift a baby from a crib. The baby will grow out of it fairly quickly. By 6 months. Grandparents, this is a great gift to give!
customer_reviews.author: Tickled Pink

customer_reviews.title: Baby not visible if you are sitting.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good crib. Just 2 issues 1) A bit flimsy, no issues for newborn but you have to be careful not to put pressure. 2) There is no way you can watch your baby if you are sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed For my child it is durable And the wheels are convenient option pull the bed to where ever I want and do my work and keep an eye on my child
customer_reviews.author: leanne

product_meta.title: Delta Children Deluxe Sweet Beginnings Bedside Bassinet - Portable Crib with Lights and Sounds, Falling Leaves
product_meta.description: Color:Falling Leaves| Style:BassinetGive your newborn a safe and comfortable place to sleep or rest with this classically styled Deluxe Sweet Beginnings Bassinet from Delta Children. Constructed of beautiful and durable materials, it features a modern, gender-neutral design that blends with many decors. This baby bassinet also features a handy nightlight and a music module that plays soothing lullabies. It has a large dual storage basket underneath, making it ideal for storing linens, diapers and necessary newborn supplies. It includes a machine washable fitted sheet, a water-resistant mattress pad and a removable canopy for added convenience. The Deluxe Sweet Beginnings bassinet is equipped with locking wheels for added safety and for easy room-to-room mobility. This bassinet is recommended for babies 0-5 months. Stop use at 5 months or once your infant begins to push up on their hands and knees, whichever comes first. Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality children's furniture affordable for all families. They know there's nothing more important than safety when it comes to your child's space. That's why all Delta Children products are built with long-lasting materials to ensure they stand up to years of use. Plus, they are rigorously tested to meet or exceed all industry safety standards.
feature_bullets: Lights and sounds: Features a calming nightlight and soothing music. Baby bassinet requires 4 AA batteries (not included)
Perfect for naps or bedtime: Adjustable, removable canopy helps block light to create a serene sleep environment
Easy to use: Large storage basket provides ample storage for all things baby | Locking wheels for easy room-to-room mobility | Includes mattress pad and fitted sheet
Size: 21 L x 35.5 D x 45.5 H inches
We put your baby's safety first: JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,611 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
